Graphic Designer/MarketingCompany DescriptionWe are a U.S. company with a small team in JODDB Industrial Park Mafraq, Jordan. We have multiple online retail stores in the United States of America. Our main requirement for this position is someone who can demonstrate WRITTEN and SPOKEN fluency in the English Language. Candidates will also handle website design and graphic design. Mainly using AI (MidJourney, ChatGPT) for image generation, product descriptions, and optimizing websites for a better user friendly interface for our customers. This is an ON-SITE ROLE in JODDB Industrial Park Mafraq, Jordan.Roles & ResponsibilitiesCandidates will use AI to generate pictures and third party software to edit these pictures for our retail websites.

Optimize search engine results on our online retail stores.
You will need to communicate with teams in the United States to understand project requirements and translate them into functional website features.

Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude towards learning new technologies.
